revision.text: Each berry has it's own individual mutation chance for whether or not it will mutate when the conditions are correct. A Berries' Mutation chance can be increased by using the [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] items. When attempting to mutate a berry, there are a few things to be aware of. We'll use mutating Persim as an example, not involving the Squirtbottle or Surprise Mulch.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
